title: Guys am not 18 yet...i only have an acknowledgement of the pan card which I recently Applied for.. Will there be an issue during counseling?

comments.body:
You don't need pan card 
I myself was 17 and didn't have pan at the time of counselling
No issues. They made me write a letter saying "I don't have a PAN card and I'll submit a copy when I get it". Nothing else.

Nah u don't need
Even I was 17 until recently. 
They will ask u to write some letter that's it.
did they ask you for migration certificate?
Am from Karnataka, so no they didn't ask
